name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Ally Special
about:
Celebrate the power of allyship with our With Women We Run (WWWR) - Ally Special session! This unique event invites allies to run alongside women, highlighting the importance of support, inclusion, and shared goals in the running community.

Open to runners of all abilities—whether you’re a seasoned runner or just starting, join us in supporting and celebrating each other.
